generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and a crosswalk, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, bordered by a fence and railing, and on the right side, bordered by a curb and vegetation.
- building: A multi-story building is visible on the right side of the road, partially obscured by trees.
- wall: A low stone wall is visible along the left side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the left side of the road, running parallel to the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a pedestrian crossing sign and another with a circular sign.
- traffic sign: A pedestrian crossing sign is visible on a pole on the left side of the road. A circular sign with "115 m" is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Grass is visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- car: A car is partially visible on the right side of the road.
- bus: A white bus is visible driving away from the camera on the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
